name: Introduction to Musicology
description: This course provides an introduction to the field of Musicology and the historical background of music throughout the world.

name: Music Theory
description: This course provides an introduction to Music Theory and the basics of music notation and composition.

name: Harmony and Counterpoint
description: This course provides an introduction to harmony and counterpoint and their application in music composition.

name: Musical Form and Analysis
description: This course provides an introduction to musical form and analysis, including the use of Roman numeral analysis and formal diagrams.

name: Advanced Music Analysis
description: This course provides an in-depth exploration of advanced music analysis techniques, including Schenkerian analysis and analytic approaches to specific genres and styles.
